automation_yaml:
id: 'office_livingroom_evening_routine'
alias: Evening Office and Living Room Lighting Routine
description: "At 5:00 PM brighten Office WLED to 80%, then Living Room to 60%, then dim Office to 40%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 204
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness: 153
  - delay: '00:00:30'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 102
